title: Ep125: Austro-Hungary on the Eastern Front, 1915
itunes:title: Ep125: Austro-Hungary on the Eastern Front, 1915
description:
In the second special instalment about the Eastern Front, Pete and Gary discuss the Austro-Hungarians in 1915.


Presenters: Peter Hart and Gary Bain

Publisher: Mat McLachlan

Producer: Jess Stebnicki
